name: Night of Horror
description:
You are on the night shift at the bank. You hear noises all the time. You need to find out what they are and find your partner. As you pass, you will need to find the keys and open locked rooms. First person game with horror elements. Explore the bank and its rooms, collect batteries for your flashlight. Darkness can conceal a variety of mysteries.

My story will be very hard to believe, especially for people who have never encountered anything out of the ordinary in their lives. People who look at many things through the prism they are accustomed to. You know, I'm not going to argue or prove anything, because everyone has his own truth. However, something in the back of my mind is eager to tell me what really happened on that unfortunate day when I was supposed to take another tour of duty.

F - flashlight, Tab - inventory
In-game controls WASD - move, left mouse button - pick up the item. Right mouse button - examine the item.

Features:
- pleasant graphics;
- simple control;
- interesting gameplay;
